des: "Awesome margaritas that pack a punch!  I prefer mine over ice without salt on the rim."
ins: Pour the frozen limeade concentrate, tequila, triple sec, lime juice, lime zest, and sugar into a blender, and blend until thoroughly mixed. Serve in glasses over ice. If preferred, add ice cubes to margarita mix in the blender, and blend until slushy; pour into glasses.
